items.title: Pixel 10, AI capabilities, and everything else we expect out of the Made by Google 2025 event
items.description: Dive into what we can expect from the Made by Google 2025 event, where the tech giant will debut its Pixel 10 lineup.

items.title: Life360 adds a new no-show notification to its app
items.description: Life360 has launched a new no-show notification to alert family members when you don't reach a location at a designated time.

items.title: Dex is an AI-powered camera device that helps children learn new languages
items.description: A new gadget called Dex allows kids to take pictures of objects and the AI translates the word into different languages.
